content: I am auctioning 1 lot of Copper Coins/Tokens which are duplicates in my collectionBitcoin Penny 2021 ZPHR [this one has some flaws around the edging]1 Dogecoin 2021Bitcoin Icon by JM Bullion https://www.jmbullion.com/1-oz-bitcoin-icon-copper-round/Bitcoin Anonymous Owl by JM Bullion https://www.jmbullion.com/1-oz-bitcoin-anonymous-owl-copper-round/Bitcoin Silver Shield 2020Litecoin by GSM https://www.goldenstatemint.com/1-oz-Litecoin-Copper-Bullion-Round-999-Fine.htmlBitcoin Bullion not Bits > https://www.apmex.com/product/87366/1-oz-copper-round-bullion-not-bits   STARTING BID: 0.0002MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC>>Bids limited to 4 decimal places please<<END TIME: Monday July 1st, 2023, 19:00 GMTSniping: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.Payment: Bitcoin BTC  Postage: By Registered mail only ~$10 but to be determined
